SELECT P.POST_ID AS postId , P.USER_ID AS userId , P.TITLE AS title , P.CONTENT AS content , P.CATEGORY AS category , C.CODE_NM AS categoryNm , P.VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount , DATE_FORMAT(P.CREATE_AT,'%Y.%m.%d') AS createAt FROM POSTS P INNER JOIN CODE C ON P.CATEGORY = C.CODE AND C.CODE_DIV = 'CATE' WHERE 1=1
AND P.POST_ID = #{postId}
AND P.CATEGORY = #{category}
ORDER BY P.VIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY P.CREATE_AT ASC
ORDER BY P.CREATE_AT DESC
ORDER BY P.TITLE ASC
ORDER BY P.TITLE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE POSTS SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
